frontend.title: Build a Web App
frontend.description: Build a web app to interact with your universal contract

call.title: Call & Deposit
call.description: Learn the fundamentals of message passing and cross-chain contract calls

swap.description: Implement a universal swap app compatible with chains like Ethereum, Solana and Bitcoin

messaging.description: Learn how to make cross-chain calls between contracts on EVM chains

solana.description: Deposit assets and call universal apps from Solana, make outgoing calls to Solana

sui.title: Sui
sui.description: Deposit assets and call universal apps from Sui

sui-withdraw-and-call.title: Sui Withdraw & Call
sui-withdraw-and-call.description: Withdraw assets and call contracts on Sui
